program main

   implicit none

   integer :: num, i, j, counter, fine, MOD = 1000000007
   character(len=100) :: s
   character(len=100), dimension(:,:), allocatable :: arr
   integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: dp
   integer :: len, base, mod_result, newNumber, counter_digits, digit
   integer, dimension(10) :: digits

   ! First part: read input and compute fine

   read(*,*) num
   allocate(arr(1:num, 1:num)) do i=1, num
      read(*, '(A)') arr(i, 1:num)
   end do

   fine =0
   ! columns
   do j=1, num
      counter =0
      do i=1, num
         if (arr(i,j) == 'C') then
            counter = counter +1
         end if
      end do
      fine = fine + (counter * (counter -1)) /2
   end do

   ! rows
   do i=1, num
      counter =0
      do j=1, num
         if (arr(i,j) == 'C') then
            counter = counter +1
         end if
      end do
      fine = fine + (counter * (counter -1)) /2
   end do

   ! Convert fine to string s
   write(s, '(i0)') fine
   s = adjustl(s)
   len = len_trim(s)

   ! Second part: process s with DP
   allocate(dp(0:len-1, 0:12))
   dp = 0
   base =1

   do i=0, len-1
      dp(i,:) =0
      character(len=1) :: current_char
      current_char = s(len -i : len -i)  ! since s is 1-based, len -i is the position
      if (current_char == '?') then
         do pre=0,12
            do next=0,9
               integer :: new_mod = mod(base * next + pre, 13)
               if (i ==0) then
                  dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + (pre ==0)
               else
                  dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + dp(i-1, pre)
               end if
               dp(i, new_mod) = mod(dp(i, new_mod), MOD)
            end do
         end do
      else
         integer :: next_val = ichar(current_char) - ichar('0')
         do pre=0,12
            integer :: new_mod = mod(base * next_val + pre, 13)
            if (i ==0) then
               dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + (pre ==0)
            else
               dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + dp(i-1, pre)
            end if
            dp(i, new_mod) = mod(dp(i, new_mod), MOD)
         end do
      end if
      base = mod(base *10, 13)
   end do

   mod_result = dp(len-1,5)

   ! Third part: process mod_result
   newNumber =0
   counter_digits =0
   do while (mod_result >0)
      integer :: r = mod(mod_result,10)
      integer :: digit
      if (9 - r < r) then
         if (mod_result /10 ==0 .and. (9 - r ==0)) then
            digit = r
         else
            digit =9 - r
         end if
      else
         digit =r
      end if
      counter_digits = counter_digits +1
      digits(counter_digits) = digit
      mod_result = mod_result /10
   end do

   newNumber =0
   do i=1, counter_digits
      newNumber = newNumber + digits(i) * 10**(i-1)
   end do

   print*, newNumber

   deallocate(arr, dp)

end program main

program main

   implicit none

   integer :: num, i, j, counter, fine, MOD = 1000000007
   character(len=100) :: s
   character(len=100), dimension(:,:), allocatable :: arr
   integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: dp
   integer :: len, base, mod_result, newNumber, counter_digits, digit
   integer, dimension(10) :: digits

   ! First part: read input and compute fine

   read(*,*) num
   allocate(arr(1:num, 1:num))
   do i=1, num
      read(*, '(A)') arr(i, 1:num)
   end do

   fine =0
   ! columns
   do j=1, num
      counter =0
      do i=1, num
         if (arr(i,j) == 'C') then
            counter = counter +1
         end if
      end do
      fine = fine + (counter * (counter -1)) /2
   end do

   ! rows
   do i=1, num
      counter =0
      do j=1, num
         if (arr(i,j) == 'C') then
            counter = counter +1
         end if
      end do
      fine = fine + (counter * (counter -1)) /2
   end do

   ! Convert fine to string s
   write(s, '(i0)') fine
   s = adjustl(s)
   len = len_trim(s)

   ! Second part: process s with DP
   allocate(dp(0:len-1, 0:12))
   dp = 0
   base =1

   do i=0, len-1
      dp(i,:) =0
      character(len=1) :: current_char
      current_char = s(len -i : len -i)  ! since s is 1-based, len -i is the position
      if (current_char == '?') then
         do pre=0,12
            do next=0,9
               integer :: new_mod = mod(base * next + pre, 13)
               if (i ==0) then
                  dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + (pre ==0)
               else
                  dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + dp(i-1, pre)
               end if
               dp(i, new_mod) = mod(dp(i, new_mod), MOD)
            end do
         end do
      else
         integer :: next_val = ichar(current_char) - ichar('0')
         do pre=0,12
            integer :: new_mod = mod(base * next_val + pre, 13)
            if (i ==0) then
               dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + (pre ==0)
            else
               dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + dp(i-1, pre)
            end if
            dp(i, new_mod) = mod(dp(i, new_mod), MOD)
         end do
      end if
      base = mod(base *10, 13)
   end do

   mod_result = dp(len-1,5)

   ! Third part: process mod_result
   newNumber =0
   counter_digits =0
   do while (mod_result >0)
      integer :: r = mod(mod_result,10)
      integer :: digit
      if (9 - r < r) then
         if (mod_result /10 ==0 .and. (9 - r ==0)) then
            digit = r
         else
            digit =9 - r
         end if
      else
         digit =r
      end if
      counter_digits = counter_digits +1
      digits(counter_digits) = digit
      mod_result = mod_result /10
   end do

   newNumber =0
   do i=1, counter_digits
      newNumber = newNumber + digits(i) * 10**(i-1)
   end do

   print*, newNumber

   deallocate(arr, dp)

end program main
